references.paper_title: Sampling is as easy as learning the score: theory for diffusion models with minimal data assumptions
references.reason: This paper establishes the theoretical foundation for the reduction from sampling to score estimation in diffusion models, which is central to the main result of the current paper.
This paper introduces the hardness of the Gaussian Pancakes problem, which is the basis for the cryptographic hardness argument in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Statistical Query Lower Bounds for Robust Estimation of High-Dimensional Gaussians and Gaussian Mixtures
references.reason: This paper introduces the Gaussian Pancakes distribution, which are used as the hard-to-estimate distributions in the current paper's reduction.

references.paper_title: Continuous LWE is as hard as LWE & applications to learning Gaussian mixtures
references.reason: This paper provides further evidence of the cryptographic hardness of the Gaussian Pancakes problem, strengthening the main result of the current paper.

references.paper_title: New bounds in some transference theorems in the geometry of numbers
references.reason: This paper provides a key result on the Gaussian mass of lattices, which is used in the current paper's analysis of Gaussian Pancakes distributions.
